pullrequest.title: More examples: install, create core library, find dependency, check pkg-config requires

content.raw:
also the test was failing because pkg-config wasn't installed

once I have some CI results that confirm the fix in any architecture, I'll approve pull request #56. we can then take our time to iron out the bugs in these tests
